thread.title: Domestic worker accuses tech execs of sex harassment, wage theft
thread.title_full: Domestic worker accuses tech execs of sex harassment, wage theft - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joe Garofoli
title: Domestic worker accuses tech execs of sex harassment, wage theft
text:
Photo: Leah Millis, The Chronicle Julieta Yang speaks emotionally about her experience working as a live-in domestic worker for tech executives Cameron Poetzscher and Varsha Rao during a press conference that announced a lawsuit from Yang against her former employers for wage theft and sexual harassment Oct. 7, 2015 at Bayanihan Community Center in San Francisco, Calif. The executives named in the lawsuit are Cameron Poetzscher and Varsha Rao of Uber and Airbnb. Julieta Yang speaks emotionally about her experience working as a...
A former housekeeper and nanny for two top San Francisco tech executives said the couple underpaid her for years and the husband sexually harassed her — including exposing himself in front of her in their Marina District home, according to a lawsuit filed Wednesday in San Francisco Superior Court. Julieta Yang speaks emotionally about her experience working as a live-in domestic worker for tech executives Cameron Poetzscher and Varsha Rao during a press conference that announced a lawsuit from Yang against her former employers for wage theft and sexual harassment Oct. 7, 2015 at Bayanihan Community Center in San Francisco, Calif. The executives named in the lawsuit are Cameron Poetzscher and Varsha Rao of Uber and Airbnb. Julieta Yang speaks emotionally about her experience working as a...
A former housekeeper and nanny for two top San Francisco tech executives said the couple underpaid her for years and the husband sexually harassed her — including exposing himself in front of her in their Marina District home, according to a lawsuit filed Wednesday in San Francisco Superior Court.
